
import ImageButtonPrimary from '/src/assets/svg/component_button.svg';
import ImageButtonSecondary from '/src/assets/svg/component_button_secondary.svg';
import ImageButtonGhost from '/src/assets/svg/component_button_ghost.svg';
import ImageButtonNegative from '/src/assets/svg/component_button_negative.svg';
import ImageButtonDisable from '/src/assets/svg/component_button_disable.svg';

import ImageButtonIconLeftPrimary from '/src/assets/svg/component_button_left_icon_primary.svg';
import ImageButtonIconLeftSecondary from '/src/assets/svg/component_button_left_icon_secondary.svg';

import ImageButtonIconRightPrimary from '/src/assets/svg/component_button_icon_right_primary.svg';
import ImageButtonIconRightSecondary from '/src/assets/svg/component_button_icon_right_secondary.svg';

import ImageButtonIconOnlyPrimary from '/src/assets/svg/component_button_icon_only_primary.svg';
import ImageButtonIconOnlySecondary from '/src/assets/svg/component_button_icon_only_secondary.svg';

# Button
Buttons represent actions that trigger states, launch new UI, or link the user to new locations with a single tap.
## Basic Button

<div style={{display: 'flex', alignItems:'center',justifyContent: 'space-evenly', border: '1px solid #F4F6F8', borderRadius: 16, padding: 32, marginBottom: 24}}>
    <ImageButtonPrimary />
    <ImageButtonSecondary />
    <ImageButtonGhost />
    <ImageButtonNegative />
    <ImageButtonDisable />
</div>

```xml
<!-- Primary -->
<com.waresix.lib.ui.component.atom.ButtonAV
    android:layout_width="wrap_content"
    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
    app:buttonText="Button" />

<!-- Secondary -->
<com.waresix.lib.ui.component.atom.ButtonAV
    android:layout_width="wrap_content"
    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
    app:buttonText="Button"
    app:buttonVariant="secondary" />

<!-- Ghost -->
<com.waresix.lib.ui.component.atom.ButtonAV
    android:layout_width="wrap_content"
    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
    app:buttonText="Button"
    app:buttonVariant="ghost" />

<!-- Negative -->
<com.waresix.lib.ui.component.atom.ButtonAV
    android:layout_width="wrap_content"
    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
    app:buttonText="Button"
    app:buttonVariant="negative" />

<!-- Disable -->
<com.waresix.lib.ui.component.atom.ButtonAV
    android:id="@+id/btnDisable"
    android:layout_width="wrap_content"
    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
    android:layout_marginTop="8dp"
    app:buttonText="Button"
    app:buttonVariant="disable" />
```
if you need a smaller button, just pass `app:buttonType="small"` to the attribute

<br/><br/>

## Button with Left icon

<div style={{display: 'flex', alignItems:'center',justifyContent: 'center', border: '1px solid #F4F6F8', borderRadius: 16, padding: 32, marginBottom: 24}}>
    <ImageButtonIconLeftPrimary style={{marginRight: 8}}/>
    <ImageButtonIconLeftSecondary />
</div>

```xml
<!-- Primary -->
<com.waresix.lib.ui.component.atom.ButtonAV
    android:layout_width="wrap_content"
    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
    app:buttonText="Button" 
    app:leftIcon="@drawable/{your_drawable}"/>

<!-- Secondary -->
<com.waresix.lib.ui.component.atom.ButtonAV
    android:layout_width="wrap_content"
    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
    app:buttonText="Button"
    app:buttonVariant="secondary"
    app:leftIcon="@drawable/{your_drawable}"/>
```

<br/><br/>

## Button with Right icon

<div style={{display: 'flex', alignItems:'center',justifyContent: 'center', border: '1px solid #F4F6F8', borderRadius: 16, padding: 32, marginBottom: 24}}>
    <ImageButtonIconRightPrimary style={{marginRight: 8}}/>
    <ImageButtonIconRightSecondary />
</div>

```xml
<!-- Primary -->
<com.waresix.lib.ui.component.atom.ButtonAV
    android:layout_width="wrap_content"
    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
    app:buttonText="Button" 
    app:rightIcon="@drawable/{your_drawable}"/>

<!-- Secondary -->
<com.waresix.lib.ui.component.atom.ButtonAV
    android:layout_width="wrap_content"
    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
    app:buttonText="Button"
    app:buttonVariant="secondary"
    app:rightIcon="@drawable/{your_drawable}"/>
```

<br/><br/>

## Button Icon Only

<div style={{display: 'flex', alignItems:'center',justifyContent: 'center', border: '1px solid #F4F6F8', borderRadius: 16, padding: 32, marginBottom: 24}}>
    <ImageButtonIconOnlyPrimary style={{marginRight: 8}}/>
    <ImageButtonIconOnlySecondary />
</div>

```xml
<!-- Primary -->
<com.waresix.lib.ui.component.atom.ButtonIconAV
    android:layout_width="wrap_content"
    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
    android:layout_marginTop="8dp"
    app:buttonVariant="primary"
    app:imgIcon="@drawable/{your_drawable}" />

<!-- Secondary -->
<com.waresix.lib.ui.component.atom.ButtonIconAV
    android:layout_width="wrap_content"
    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
    android:layout_marginTop="8dp"
    app:buttonVariant="secondary"
    app:imgIcon="@drawable/{your_drawable}" />
```
